summary: Amidst financial crises and unprecedented public school budget cuts, Brooklyn Castle takes an intimate look at the challenges and triumphs facing members of a junior high school's champion chess team.
cast: Je'Daiah Ballantyne|Michelle Ballantyne|Rochelle Ballantyne|Pamela Ballard|Oghenakpobo Efekoro|John Galvin|Christiana Inuwere|Ovoie Inuwere|Elizabeth Johnston|Patrick Johnston|Tommy Johnston|Mikael-Rhey Mongroo|Juan Paredes|Fred Rubino|Elizabeth Spiegel|Alexis Paredes Toledo|Viviana Paredes Toledo|Elizabeth Vicary|Justus Williams|Latisha Williams|Lionel Williams
title: Brooklyn Castle
